title: ActivityDefinition data model based on HL7 equivalent resource

resourceType.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/' This is a ActivityDefinition resource

meta.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/Meta' The metadata about a resource. This is content in the resource that is maintained by the infrastructure. Changes to the content might not always be associated with version changes to the resource.

_language.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

text.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/Narrative' A human-readable summary of the resource conveying the essential clinical and business information for the resource.

contained.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/ResourceList' These resources do not have an independent existence apart from the resource that contains them - they cannot be identified independently, and nor can they have their own independent transaction scope.

extension.description: Relationship. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/Extension' May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the resource. To make the use of extensions safe and manageable, there is a strict set of governance  applied to the definition and use of extensions. Though any implementer can define an extension, there is a set of requirements that SHALL be met as part of the definition of the extension.

items.description: Optional Extension Element - found in all resources.

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

modifierExtension.description:
Relationship. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/Extension' May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the resource and that modifies the understanding of the element that contains it and/or the understanding of the containing element's descendants. Usually modifier elements provide negation or qualification. To make the use of extensions safe and manageable, there is a strict set of governance applied to the definition and use of extensions. Though any implementer is allowed to define an extension, there is a set of requirements that SHALL be met as part of the definition of the extension. Applications processing a resource are required to check for modifier extensions.

Modifier extensions SHALL NOT change the meaning of any elements on Resource or DomainResource (including cannot change the meaning of modifierExtension itself).

items.description: Optional Extension Element - found in all resources.

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/Identifier' A formal identifier that is used to identify this activity definition when it is represented in other formats, or referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance.

items.description: An identifier - identifies some entity uniquely and unambiguously. Typically this is used for business identifiers.

subjectReference.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/Reference' A reference from one resource to another.

subjectCanonical.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/' A code, group definition, or canonical reference that describes  or identifies the intended subject of the activity being defined.  Canonical references are allowed to support the definition of protocols for drug and substance quality specifications, and is allowed to reference a MedicinalProductDefinition, SubstanceDefinition, AdministrableProductDefinition, ManufacturedItemDefinition, or PackagedProductDefinition resource.

_subjectCanonical.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

date.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/dateTime' A date, date-time or partial date (e.g. just year or year + month).  If hours and minutes are specified, a time zone SHALL be populated. The format is a union of the schema types gYear, gYearMonth, date and dateTime. Seconds must be provided due to schema type constraints but may be zero-filled and may be ignored.                 Dates SHALL be valid dates.

_date.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

contact.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/ContactDetail' Contact details to assist a user in finding and communicating with the publisher.

items.description: Specifies contact information for a person or organization.

description.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/markdown' A string that may contain Github Flavored Markdown syntax for optional processing by a mark down presentation engine

_description.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

useContext.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/UsageContext' The content was developed with a focus and intent of supporting the contexts that are listed. These contexts may be general categories (gender, age, ...) or may be references to specific programs (insurance plans, studies, ...) and may be used to assist with indexing and searching for appropriate activity definition instances.

items.description: Specifies clinical/business/etc. metadata that can be used to retrieve, index and/or categorize an artifact. This metadata can either be specific to the applicable population (e.g., age category, DRG) or the specific context of care (e.g., venue, care setting, provider of care).

jurisdiction.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/CodeableConcept' A legal or geographic region in which the activity definition is intended to be used.

items.description: A concept that may be defined by a formal reference to a terminology or ontology or may be provided by text.

_purpose.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

_copyright.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

approvalDate.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/date' A date or partial date (e.g. just year or year + month). There is no time zone. The format is a union of the schema types gYear, gYearMonth and date.  Dates SHALL be valid dates.

_approvalDate.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

lastReviewDate.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/date' A date or partial date (e.g. just year or year + month). There is no time zone. The format is a union of the schema types gYear, gYearMonth and date.  Dates SHALL be valid dates.

_lastReviewDate.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

effectivePeriod.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/Period' A time period defined by a start and end date and optionally time.

topic.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/CodeableConcept' Descriptive topics related to the content of the activity. Topics provide a high-level categorization of the activity that can be useful for filtering and searching.

items.description: A concept that may be defined by a formal reference to a terminology or ontology or may be provided by text.

author.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/ContactDetail' An individiual or organization primarily involved in the creation and maintenance of the content.

items.description: Specifies contact information for a person or organization.

editor.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/ContactDetail' An individual or organization primarily responsible for internal coherence of the content.

items.description: Specifies contact information for a person or organization.

reviewer.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/ContactDetail' An individual or organization primarily responsible for review of some aspect of the content.

items.description: Specifies contact information for a person or organization.

endorser.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/ContactDetail' An individual or organization responsible for officially endorsing the content for use in some setting.

items.description: Specifies contact information for a person or organization.

relatedArtifact.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/RelatedArtifact' Related artifacts such as additional documentation, justification, or bibliographic references.

items.description: Related artifacts such as additional documentation, justification, or bibliographic references.

items.description: A URI that is a reference to a canonical URL on a FHIR resource

_intent.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

_priority.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

_doNotPerform.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

timingTiming.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/Timing' Specifies an event that may occur multiple times. Timing schedules are used to record when things are planned, expected or requested to occur. The most common usage is in dosage instructions for medications. They are also used when planning care of various kinds, and may be used for reporting the schedule to which past regular activities were carried out.

timingDateTime.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/' The period, timing or frequency upon which the described activity is to occur.

_timingDateTime.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

timingAge.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/Age' A duration of time during which an organism (or a process) has existed.

timingPeriod.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/Period' A time period defined by a start and end date and optionally time.

timingRange.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/Range' A set of ordered Quantities defined by a low and high limit.

location.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/Reference' A reference from one resource to another.

participant.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/ActivityDefinition_Participant' Indicates who should participate in performing the action described.

items.description: This resource allows for the definition of some activity to be performed, independent of a particular patient, practitioner, or other performance context.

productReference.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/Reference' A reference from one resource to another.

productCodeableConcept.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/CodeableConcept' A concept that may be defined by a formal reference to a terminology or ontology or may be provided by text.

quantity.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/Quantity' A measured amount (or an amount that can potentially be measured). Note that measured amounts include amounts that are not precisely quantified, including amounts involving arbitrary units and floating currencies.

dosage.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/Dosage' Provides detailed dosage instructions in the same way that they are described for MedicationRequest resources.

items.description: Indicates how the medication is/was taken or should be taken by the patient.

bodySite.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/CodeableConcept' Indicates the sites on the subject's body where the procedure should be performed (I.e. the target sites).

items.description: A concept that may be defined by a formal reference to a terminology or ontology or may be provided by text.

specimenRequirement.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/Reference' Defines specimen requirements for the action to be performed, such as required specimens for a lab test.

items.description: A reference from one resource to another.

observationRequirement.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/Reference' Defines observation requirements for the action to be performed, such as body weight or surface area.

items.description: A reference from one resource to another.

observationResultRequirement.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/Reference' Defines the observations that are expected to be produced by the action.

items.description: A reference from one resource to another.

transform.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/canonical' A URI that is a reference to a canonical URL on a FHIR resource

dynamicValue.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/ActivityDefinition_DynamicValue' Dynamic values that will be evaluated to produce values for elements of the resulting resource. For example, if the dosage of a medication must be computed based on the patient's weight, a dynamic value would be used to specify an expression that calculated the weight, and the path on the request resource that would contain the result.

items.description: This resource allows for the definition of some activity to be performed, independent of a particular patient, practitioner, or other performance context.

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity type. It has to be 'ActivityDefinition'
